title: List of all Androidfloating action button   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidfloating action button   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: fab
repoList.description: Floating Action Button Library for Android

repoList.name: FabulousFilter
repoList.description: Android library to animate Floating Action Button to Bottom Sheet Dialog and vice-versa

repoList.name: material-sheet-fab
repoList.description: Android library that provides the floating action button to sheet transition from Google's Material Design.

repoList.name: FloatingActionButtonExpandable
repoList.description: An android library that brings the floating action button expandable

repoList.name: customFloatingActionButton
repoList.description: This view is for replacement of standard Floating Action Button from Google Support Library. It is easy to use, customizable and you can also add text to button

repoList.name: FABtransitions
repoList.description: Android Library to create Floating Action Button Animations.

repoList.name: FABRevealMenu-master
repoList.description: A general purpose android UI library to show a user show menu in accordance of Floating action button with material design guidelines.

repoList.name: Morphing-Material-Dialogs
repoList.description: Material dialog :heart: morphing animation ----------- An android kotlin UI library for building beautiful animations for converting a floating action button into a material dialog.

repoList.name: FloatingActionButton
repoList.description: [Updated Clans FAB library] Android Floating Action Button based on Material Design specification

repoList.name: FabProgress
repoList.description: Android Floating Action Button with ProgressRing Library
